product_name: APPALACHIAN TRAIL CONSERVANCY A Walk for Sunshine-3rd Edition
long_description: Now with advice and tips for your own hikes, the 3rd edition of Jeff Alt's A Walk for Sunshine delivers a captivating narrative of his personal adventure along the storied Appalachian Trail.
short_description: Now with advice and tips for your own hikes, the 3rd edition of Jeff Alt's A Walk for Sunshine delivers a captivating narrative of his personal adventure along the storied Appalachian Trail.
